about_the_game:
Dig, Get Rich through Trade, and Transform Your Town into a Legend!

About
Heritage Excavation is a unique adventure you embark on with an ancient map passed down from your grandfather. As you uncover the lost secrets of ancient civilizations, turn your town into a wealthy tourist hub. Explore the mysterious underground world with realistic excavation mechanics, and reshape your town’s fate through trade and strategy skills.

Search for valuable artifacts in underground tunnels, solve puzzles, and dive deep into the story. You can display the artifacts you find in your museum, sell them at auctions, or put them on sale in . Use the money you earn to upgrade your equipment and further develop your town!

Key Features

💎 Realistic Excavation Experience
Plan your digs and equip yourself with the right tools to uncover rare ancient artifacts. Each excavation is a unique adventure full of discovery and risk!

🏛️ Trade and Management
Win the best prices at auctions, increase your visitors by displaying artifacts in your museum, or cater to collectors in your antique shop. Every decision affects your profits!

🌌 Underground Discoveries and Stories
Explore underground tunnels to solve mysteries of ancient civilizations. Uncover secret passages, ancient puzzles, and overcome unexpected traps to reveal an unforgettable story.

🏘️ Town Development
Use the profits you earn to rebuild your town! Transform it into a tourist paradise with new buildings, improved roads, and investments that enhance the lives of its people.

🌦️ Dynamic Systems
Experience realistic gameplay with day/night cycles and variable weather conditions. Manage your resources carefully and make the right decisions at the right time.

Gameplay Mechanics

  • Excavation Planning: Choose your excavation site, select the right tools, and carefully extract the artifacts you find.

  • Artifact Evaluation and Auctions: Consult experts on the value of the artifacts you discover and make the most profitable sales.

  • Ancient Puzzles and Traps: Solve ancient puzzles in underground tunnels and uncover hidden passages.

  • Museum and Shop Management: Organize your museum to attract visitors, or manage your shop effectively.

  • Town Development: Expand your town by constructing new buildings and meeting the needs of the people.

Visual Style and Sound Design

🎨 Visuals
Enjoy a delightful atmosphere with visuals designed in a Low Poly style, offering a warm and nostalgic aesthetic.

🎧 Sound Design
Immerse yourself in the world of the game with dynamic environmental sounds, original voice acting, and music inspired by ancient civilizations.

name: Heritage Excavation
short_description: A simulation-type archaeology game.The player, who discovers ancient excavation sites inherited from their grandfather, uncovers ancient artifacts, displays them in a museum, puts them up for sale, and revitalizes the town. It offers an enriched experience with puzzles and town development elements.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Danish, Indonesian, Dutch, Finnish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish*, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Greek, Czech, Swedish
*languages with full audio support
